document_data.caption: A map showing the Bridge Gate (labeled #2) in southwest Skuld.
document_data.name: Bridge Gate
document_data.mainbody: The '''Bridge Gate''' was a point of entry into the city of [[Skuld]] in [[Mulhorand]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|490 Skuld}}
document_data.Location: The Bridge Gate stood in the southwest corner of the city, separating part of Skuld on the north side of the [[River of Shadows]] from the [[Skuld/Naval Yard|Naval Yard]] and the small section of the city located on the south side of the river.
